channel.title: Favourite Piece of music?
channel.description:
First of all - to get the main thing striaght. I said "Piece of music". Not the latest greenday shit or any of your rock 'n' roll bollocks. We're talking proper music.
Needs not much of an introduction.
Mine?:
Time Lapse - Michael Nyman Mozart's 4th Symphony - Mozart.
And the Good Ol' pachelbel's cannon ;)
Oh yeah, and: C U When U Get There - Coolie. SRSLY!
EDIT: Starblaster will probably filter this as spam, and as I can't delete it, just let it get bumped down.

item.title: Favourite Piece of music?
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

lol why would i give up? and how could i give up??? i was never fighting with him in teh first place so therefore i couldnt give up rofl. i just posted my opinion and asked a few questions and he answered me. now tell me, is there anything at all wrong with that ??? we were just having a good discussion because this is the DISCUSSION section incase you didnt know james. now back on topic.

[quote=“David, post:1, topic:5684”]First of all - to get the main thing striaght. I said “Piece of music”. Not the latest greenday shit or any of your rock ‘n’ roll bollocks. We’re talking proper music.

Needs not much of an introduction.

Mine?:

Time Lapse - Michael Nyman
Mozart’s 4th Symphony - Mozart.

And the Good Ol’ pachelbel’s cannon

Oh yeah, and: C U When U Get There - Coolie. SRSLY!

EDIT: Starblaster will probably filter this as spam, and as I can’t delete it, just let it get bumped down.[/quote]

hey man i just think its kinda funny that you like that kind of music thats all. but like i said if you like it you go right ahead and keep on listening to it m8.

give up now. Your going to lose.

i know from past experiences

item.title: Favourite Piece of music?
item.dc:creator: @David David
item.description:
@David wrote:

mjordan:

lol “pieces of music”. how old are you man? or are you just a plain geek? cuz your seriously the only person that i know or have heard of that listens to that kind of stuff and likes it. but its kewl… i guess, cuz u listen to what you like and i guess if you like it just keep on keepin on man.

Shut up.

What? I’m a geek because I like classical music? That’s the worst discrimination I’ve heard of. Also - you obviously don’t knwo the definition of a piece of music, and should therefore withdraw your further comments from this.

If you were good at music (as in the lessons in school), you’d almost definatly like classical music aswell as other things (as I do). But from your prespective; I guess “that’s just gay”.

Oh, and don’t try and tell me you’re good at music, because you’d be wrong.

Also, combined with my inituitive and your inability, I took the liberty to define descimination for you:

disÂ·crimÂ·iÂ·naÂ·tion Audio pronunciation of “discrimination” ( P ) Pronunciation Key (d-skrm-nshn)
n.

  1. The act of discriminating.
  2. The ability or power to see or make fine distinctions; discernment.
  3. Treatment or consideration based on class or category rather than individual merit; partiality or prejudice: racial discrimination; discrimination against foreigners.

Read full topic

item.title: Favourite Piece of music?
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

pixels:

Bohemian Rhapsody yaya

ahhh yes VERY great song. it is considered one of the most famous songs of all time. but only one thing…it isnt a “piece” of music as he called it (at least i dont think it is). because it is by Queen and queen is classic rock so therefore it is not a “piece” of music like he wanted as say mozart or any of that other crap is.
